recipes.name: Meatballs and Pasta
preparation: In a large bowl, mix ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Shape the mixture into meatballs.
Heat a large pan over medium heat and cook the meatballs until browned on all sides.
Add the marinara sauce to the pan and let it simmer for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the meatballs over the spaghetti with extra Parmesan cheese on top.

recipes.name: Napoleon Cake
preparation: Bake the puff pastry sheets according to package instructions and let them cool.
In a saucepan, heat milk until it's about to boil.
In a bowl, whisk together sugar, egg yolks, cornstarch, and vanilla extract.
Slowly pour the hot milk into the bowl, whisking constantly.
Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over medium heat until thickened.
Remove from heat and stir in the butter until melted.
Let the custard cool completely.
Layer the puff pastry and custard alternately, ending with a puff pastry layer.
Dust the top with powdered sugar before serving.
